TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebItem extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 讓已升級的 Visual Basic 6.0 專案能在 ASP.NET 中執行。

span.span: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 projects to run in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案升級為 Visual Basic 中，將它轉換成[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to Visual Basic, it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project. 宣告會加入至您的專案： 一個用於`WebClass`，另一個用於每個`WebItems`和`Templates`中`WebClass`專案。Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` in the `WebClass` project. A`Page_Load`事件程序會加入至專案，先建立物件，然後`WebItem`物件的每個`WebItems`和`Templates`聯 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案。A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project, creating first a object and then `WebItem` objects for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project. 最後，在`Page_Load`事件程序，您會看到呼叫`WebClass`相容性的執行階段： 。Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: . 這可讓執行階段呈現要求 URL 中指定。This enables the runtime to render the specified in the Request URL. 這個程式碼是只有新的程式碼加入至升級的專案，並只是用來模擬基礎行為的 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`執行階段。This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and only serves to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public WebItem (string Name, Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.WebClass AssociatedWebClass, string HtmlTemplateFilename = "");

Public Sub New (Name As String, AssociatedWebClass As WebClass, Optional HtmlTemplateFilename As String = "")

param.name: Name
param.span: ，包含 Visual Basic 6.0 物件的 屬性。

span.span: A that contains the property for the Visual Basic 6.0 object.

param.name: HtmlTemplateFilename
param.span: 與 Visual Basic 6.0 相關聯的 Visual Basic 6.0 的檔案名稱。

span.span: The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用於升級工具升級 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`專案加入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]網站專案。The class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，這個字串用來做為 HTML 範本中取代標記名稱的前置詞。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that is used to prefix replacement tag names in an HTML template.

value.span: ，識別用來辨認 HTML 範本中取代標記的 序列 (Sequence)。

span.span: A that identifies the sequence used to recognize replacement tags in an HTML template.
